title: When I try to set the text notifications on the car I get a message reading "Your phone does not appear to support this function. Some phones may have an additional setting to enable this feature". What is that additional setting that I need to enable? Thanks!
content: When I try to set the text notifications on the car I get a message reading "Your phone does not appear to support this function. Some phones may have an additional setting to enable this feature". What is that additional setting that I need to enable? Thanks!
